attributes.action: apply pressure to Cadbury plc that they might reintroduce the classic lime barrel to their famous Milk Tray selection.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cadbury's foolish focus groups have led them to believe that the Great British Public no longer wishes to enjoy the delight of the lime barrel.  This is clearly false, isn't it?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
